conversation.content: Hi, I want to book a flight for a group of 8 people. Do you offer any group discounts?
Hello! Yes, we offer special fares for small group bookings. Could you please provide the departure and destination cities along with the travel date?
We’re flying from New York to Los Angeles on March 15.

Got it! We have multiple flights available on that date. Group discounts usually apply for 10 or more passengers, but I can check if there are any special offers for your group. Would you like assistance with seat selection as well?
Yes, that would be great! We’d like to sit together if possible.
I understand! We will try our best to assign seats together, but availability depends on the flight. Would you like to proceed with the booking now?
Can I add baggage options now, or do I have to do that later?

You can add baggage options now or later through our website or mobile app. If your group requires extra baggage, we also offer discounted rates for pre-booking. Let me know how you'd like to proceed!
Okay, let me check with my group, and I’ll get back to you soon.
Sounds good! Feel free to reach out whenever you're ready. Safe travels!
Hi, I’m booking a flight for a group of 6. Can I make one payment for all tickets?
Hello! Yes, you can make a single payment for all passengers in the group. Would you like to proceed with booking now?
Yes, we’re traveling from Chicago to Miami on April 10.
Great! I can proceed with booking your tickets. Would you like to add baggage or meal preferences for your group?
No, we’ll add those later. How will I receive the tickets?
Once the payment is completed, all tickets will be emailed to you. You can also access them through our website or mobile app.
Perfect! I’ll complete the payment now.
Sounds good! Let me know if you need any further assistance. Safe travels!
Hello, do you offer any special services for small groups traveling with children?
Hi! Yes, we provide priority boarding for families with young children. We also offer in-flight entertainment and child-friendly meals. Would you like to add any special requests for your booking?
That’s great! We’re flying with 2 kids under 5 years old. Do we need to book separate seats for them?
Children under 2 years can travel on a parent's lap, but for safety and comfort, you may choose to book a separate seat for them. Would you like me to check seat availability for your group?
Yes, please. Also, do you provide baby strollers at the airport?
Yes, most airports provide stroller services. You can also check in your personal stroller at the gate. Would you like assistance with pre-booking a stroller?
No, that’s okay. I’ll bring my own. Thanks for the info!
You're welcome! Let me know if you need anything else. Have a great flight!
Hi, can I book multiple flights for my group under one reservation?
Hello! Yes, you can book multiple flights under a single reservation. Would you like assistance in selecting the flights?
Yes, we need to fly from San Francisco to New York on June 5 and return on June 12.
Got it! I will check availability for both flights. Would you like direct flights, or are layovers acceptable?
We prefer direct flights if available.
Understood! I found direct flights on both dates. Would you like to proceed with booking?
Yes, please! Can I add seat preferences now?
Absolutely! You can select your seats during booking. Let me know if you have any other requests.
Hi, if one person in our group cancels, can we get a refund for their ticket?
Hello! Refunds depend on the fare type you selected. Would you like me to check the cancellation policy for your booking?
Yes, please! We booked economy class tickets.
For economy class, cancellation fees may apply. If your ticket is refundable, you will receive a partial refund. Would you like to proceed with the cancellation?
Not yet. Can we transfer the ticket to another person instead?
Unfortunately, tickets are non-transferable. However, I can help you with rebooking options if needed.
Got it. I’ll check with my group and decide.
No problem! Let me know if you need any further assistance.
